title: ICE when matching a dereferenced complex newtype against the newtype

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This doesn't reproduce if the inner type is something like uint or a tuple.

``` rust
struct S(Either<uint, uint>);

fn main() {
    match *S(Left(5)) {
      S(_) => {}
    }
}
```

